import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { AuthorizationDtoRequest } from "../../interface/request/login/AuthorizationDtoRequest"; import { LocalStorageUtil } from "../../utils/LocalStorageUtil"; import { api } from "../../utils/AxiosUtil"; export default function SignIn() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isPasswordVisible, setisPasswordVisible] = useState(false); const [login, setLogin] = useState({ phone: "", password: "" }); const [error, setError] = useState(false); const authorization = () => { const request: AuthorizationDtoRequest = { phone: login.phone, password: login.password, }; const path = "/api/v1/login"; api .post(path, request) .then((data) => { LocalStorageUtil.setJWTToken(data.data.data.tokens.access_token); LocalStorageUtil.setRefreshToken(data.data.data.tokens.refresh_token); navigate("/home"); }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); setError(error); }); }; return (
